sentences.en: a leading protagonist of the conservation movement
sentences.cn: 资源保护运动的急先锋
当地的一个环境保护团体

sentences.en: Conservation is an issue which gets a lot of attention these days — whether it means preserving old buildings, or protecting the environment.
sentences.cn: 资源保护是目前备受关注的问题——不管它指的是对古建筑的保护，还是对环境的保护。

sentences.en: Energy conservation as a philosophy was born out of the 1973 oil crisis.
sentences.cn: 能源节约的理念产生于1973年的石油危机。

sentences.en: Even well-meaning attempts at conservation can bring problems.
sentences.cn: 即使是出于善意想开展自然保护也可能会引来麻烦。

sentences.en: He is founding director of The Conservation Foundation.
sentences.cn: 他是自然资源保护基金会的创办负责人。

sentences.en: In time these new excavations will require conservation.
sentences.cn: 这些刚发掘出来的物品需要及时保护。

sentences.en: Published in association with the Council for the Protection of Rural England, the book provides refreshing solutions to the long-term problem of water conservation.
sentences.cn: 这本书与英格兰乡村保护委员会合作出版，就节约水资源这个长期问题提供了全新的解决方法。
她对保护环境这个问题十分关心.

sentences.en: Some accommodation between conservation and tourism is essential.
sentences.cn: 自然环境的保护与旅游业之间的相互协调是至关重要的.

sentences.en: The district is under consideration for designation as a conservation area.
sentences.cn: 正在考虑将这个地区指定为保护区。

sentences.en: The zoo is doing major conservation work, both in captivity and in the field.
sentences.cn: 无论在圈养场还是在野外，动物园在动物保护方面都承担了主要的工作。

sentences.en: Then he began his most famous work, the conservation and rebinding of the Book of Kells.
sentences.cn: 之后他就开始了他最为出名的工作，即保护并重新装订《凯尔斯书》。

sentences.en: This proposal will incense conservation campaigners.
sentences.cn: 这项提议会激怒环保人士。

sentences.en: to be interested in wildlife conservation
sentences.cn: 对野生动物保护感兴趣

sentences.en: You probably won't need to apply for planning permission unless you live in a listed building or conservation area.
sentences.cn: 除非你住在已列入文保名录的建筑或古建保护区之内，否则应该不需要申请规划许可。

words.tran_cn: 保存；将…做成蜜饯；使守恒

phrases.tran_cn: 质量守恒；质量守恒定律
动量守恒；动量不变原理
水土保持耕作；保护耕作，保育耕作
自然保护；自然保育；自然保持
节约用水，水源保护；水利
世界自然保护联盟；世界自然保育联合会

trans.tran_en: the protection of natural things such as animals, plants, forests etc, to prevent them from being spoiled or destroyed
